title: [Sublet] 1bd apartment in downtown - Move-in Jul 30
posting_body: ['Looking for a sublet for 1 BD Apartment on 24th floor.', 'Fantastic view on the loop!', 'Date: Move-in - Jul 30.', 'Leas ends on Nov 6 with ability to renew.', 'Price: $1869 + around $120 utility.', 'It less than the current price!', 'It is Presidential Towers https://www.presidentialtowersapts.com/gallery', 'New appliances, wooden floor.', 'Easy access to downtown and all the parks, restaurants, shops etc.', 'New tenants will need to pay $65 per person for application.', 'Management will do a background check.', 'NO deposit needed.', 'Additional fees (if applicable):', 'Attached Garage - $265', 'gym and pool - $99', 'having a pet - $400 + $25 each month']
